document.discussion_title: Glencore PLC (GLEN) Given Outperform Rating at BNP Paribas
document.topic_text: Tweet Glencore PLC (LON:GLEN) ‘s stock had its “outperform” rating reissued by equities research analysts at BNP Paribas in a research report issued on Monday. They currently have a GBX 175 ($2.25) price objective on the natural resources company’s stock. BNP Paribas’ target price points to a potential downside of 7.19% from the company’s previous close. A number of other equities research analysts have also recently issued reports on the stock. Citigroup Inc. restated a “neutral” rating on shares of Glencore PLC in a report on Monday. Macquarie cut shares of Glencore PLC to a “neutral” rating and set a GBX 200 ($2.58) target price for the company. in a research note on Thursday. Credit Suisse Group AG reiterated a “neutral” rating and issued a GBX 210 ($2.70) target price on shares of Glencore PLC in a research note on Monday, August 15th. S&P Global Inc. set a GBX 130 ($1.67) target price on shares of Glencore PLC and gave the company a “sell” rating in a research note on Friday, August 12th. Finally, Societe Generale reiterated a “buy” rating and issued a GBX 230 ($2.96) target price on shares of Glencore PLC in a research note on Friday, August 12th. Five research analysts have rated the stock with a sell rating, eleven have assigned a hold rating and twelve have given a buy rating to the stock. Glencore PLC currently has a consensus rating of “Hold” and an average target price of GBX 168.04 ($2.16). //www.americanbankingnews.com/2016/08/22/glencore-plc-glen-given-outperform-rating-at-bnp-paribas/ Shares of Glencore PLC ( LON:GLEN ) opened at 185.166 on Monday. The stock’s market capitalization is GBX 26.33 billion. The stock’s 50 day moving average price is GBX 184.84 and its 200-day moving average price is GBX 150.39. Glencore PLC has a 12 month low of GBX 66.67 and a 12 month high of GBX 200.97. Glencore plc is an integrated producer and marketer of natural resources, with activities in the production, refinement, processing, storage, transport and marketing of metals and minerals, energy products and agricultural products. The Company’s segments include metals and minerals, energy products, agricultural products, and corporate and other. Receive News & Ratings for Glencore PLC Glencore PLC
